com.mesosphere.sdk.dcos.http

Class DcosHttpClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.http.impl.client.HttpClientBuilder
      • com.mesosphere.sdk.dcos.http.DcosHttpClientBuilder

  • public class DcosHttpClientBuilder
extends org.apache.http.impl.client.HttpClientBuilder
    A DcosHttpClientBuilder is a helper that simplifies common modifications of org.apache.http.client.HttpClient.
